vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an electrical substation on property zoned an R-16(A) Single Family District, on the west side of Edgemere Road, between Lawnhaven Road and Royalton Drive
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a revised site plan and staff’s recommended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and the applicant’s requested conditions with changes
Z234-142(LC)
